body:
我也遇到这个问题！！
Whitelabel Error Page
This application has no configured error view, so you are seeing this as a fallback.

Thu Dec 06 17:51:29 CST 2018
There was an unexpected error (type=Internal Server Error, status=500).
**org.springframework.cloud.gateway.filter.factory.HystrixGatewayFilterFactory$RouteHystrixCommand cannot be cast to org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.plugin.interceptor.enhance.EnhancedInstance**

使用springcloud gateway代理转发的时候，出现异常
Whitelabel Error Page
This application has no configured error view, so you are seeing this as a fallback.

Thu Dec 06 17:51:29 CST 2018
There was an unexpected error (type=Internal Server Error, status=500).
**org.springframework.cloud.gateway.filter.factory.HystrixGatewayFilterFactory$RouteHystrixCommand cannot be cast to org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.plugin.interceptor.enhance.EnhancedInstance**
Need your demo codes.
Why submit duplicate issue?

> o
就是一个普通代理转发项目哇，启动时候指定skywalking-agent.jar。
Duplicate #2008 .
FYI @JaredTan95 This PR is using your system env feature to make the modules sharing the single one env variable.

The `oap-server/generate-tool` module includes the source codes of compiling tool. This tool is already integrated
maven compile phase. So, unless you want to change the tool source codes, you don't need to set anything.

Run `./mvnw compile` or `./mvnw package`, the generated codes of the oal script are in `oap-server/generate-tool/target/generated-sources/oal/*`.
@liuhaoyang The repository structure has changed. OAL-tool has been integrated.

I will test this in log4j and log4j2, I only deal with logback before @ASCE1885 
in logback ,the grammer for `MDC` in logback.xml is `%XtracdId` not `%traceId`
This is a very important bug fix we need to review. And relate to jvm7+ parallel classloader.
@ascrutae @candyleer @JaredTan95 This is a very special bug and fix way. I think, for now, this is the right solution. `AgentClassLoader` is not parallel sensitive. It is OK to open this if possible.
Thank so much for this contribution and fixed.
mark. the same question with 5.0.0-GA

> can you tell me how to configure span created and closed right ?
 
This is based on plugin. You need to be sure, each plugin works well. Especially the plugins related to your missing spans.
The logs look like good. Nothing special.

@wu-sheng Yep, I'd be glad to test this feature that's very interesting to the user.

> it does not depend on anything in tookit activation.

If not, I prefer a new optional plugin in `apm-sniffer/optional-plugins`/log4j2-plugin .  The compiled jar should be located in `agent/optional-plugins`. So it means, this plugin would work in default, you need to copy it to `plugins` folder for making it works.

Also, you need to write document linked here, https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/setup/service-agent/java-agent/README.md#plugins

Ref another optional plugin document, https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/setup/service-agent/java-agent/agent-optional-plugins/trace-ignore-plugin.md

Let's add new test cases too. @ascrutae Please review.

Merged. Let's fix webflux and run tests to review all existing cases.

You have upgraded the backend, reset the storage, but agent doesn't reboot? Or, haven't clear the buffer folder?

Look like dirty data in agent cache.
I check this situation, and where is the buffer folder ?
Should base on your `application.yml`
By the way, I still can't continue collecting data after eight hours. This problem has been bothering me for a week.
I still don't understand why two. See our changelog, https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/pull/2028 . These the bugs and features in next release, which is comming soon.

I don't understand, why 8 hours. In 6.x series, we didn't do anything in 8 hours cycle. In 5.x, deleting data did, which in some cases could make your ElasticSearch blocking. I used to know from the community feedback.

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/20533464/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/20533464)

I am also thinking about why it is 8 hours.  I looked for all the configurations and found no 8 hour related configuration. The only thought is that the Chinese time zone and UTC are 8 hours apart. But when I don't use namespace, I can run normally. But in the case of not using namespace, it is working fine. So I  have been understanding the source code of the storage-elasticsearch-plugin component and I hope I can find the reason.
Are you using 5.x? In 5.x, first delete happens in 8 hours later.
No, I user 6.0.0-beta. I checkout  the source code from master, and build it myself.
Then, no clue.

ok

The paging query in every database are similar.  It gets slower and slower as you page down too much.
Although, the elasticsearch notice us to use scroll search to request large data. But, I suggest we can add a limit size in UI and add other search conditions to make it easier for users to search for desired results.

I agree.

This image have been checked by PPMC, committer and Apache team before we do the release. So it can't miss any package from my understanding. 

These packages will be placed in generated folders after you run`./mvnw compile`.
See `Setup your IntelliJ IDEA` section, you will find the introductions. And at the same time, `./mvnw compile` or `./mvnw package` requires nothing to do.
thank you. i will try. you gets up earlier today, and have a nice day.

> thank you. i will try. you gets up earlier today, and have a nice day.

Actually, I am at Seattle, so, just regular work time. Have a good day, too.

Oh, i found this error in the skywalking-collector-server.log

![error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24448049/49911328-f60ca580-fec0-11e8-9189-41e9050a3d3a.jpeg)
I see these two problems #1395 and #1944 .Does this mean that skywalking5.0.0-ga does not support xpack parameter configuration and can only modify the code
@wu-sheng 5.x is transport client, default is 9300 port, not 9200, 6.x is rest client, default is 9200.

@xiaoni157 From you logs, I see a missing authentication exception. Our elasticsearch client not support authentication. This is a feature of XPack and XPack is not opensource license. So, you must change the dependency of the elasticsearch client from transport to XPack and setting the username and password by XPack client by yourself.
ok, i see. thank you.
I will try to implement the authentication of the Elasticsearch.

Good plan to do this. Try to implement a prototype version in GA version, and let's take at least 3-4 months to make sure it could work well in production env. Then mark it production ready and default storage client, in SkyWalking 6.2 or 6.3. If anything goes well.

> English only accepted here.

so please replay this question
You should easy to find this reason by your self. `capture/continued` require running when active span exists, which in your case, clearly don't exist.
